name: jQuery Todo
tagline: jQuery plugin to create todo list with HTML5 localStorage.
body:
## Welcome to jQuery Todo Page.
Created this plugin after taking help and guideline from SitePoint tutorial and [Sdaityari Plugin](http://sdaityari.github.io/to-do-list/). Implement customization in plugin coding pattern to generate the todo at run time. I have plan to improve it more and add options to integrate third party services, update todo items.

### Setup Demo
You have to understanding of bower to run the demo. jQuery Todo demo depend on below mention plugins. 

* Bootstrap 3.3.4
* jQuery 1.11.1
* jQuery-ui 1.11.1

**Run this code in terminal to setup demo**

`bower update`

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Plugin? Check out [repository](https://github.com/musamamasood/jquery.todo) and Iâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
